pages.title: About Me
pages.text: Welcome to My Page!About MeHi, I’m Andy Zhang, a junior student at Beihang University majoring in Electronic Information Engineering. Currently, I’m diving deep into PYNQ-Z2 and deep learning. Achievements Blue Bridge Cup Competition: First Prize in Microcontroller Category Beijing Physics Competition: Second Prize Electronic Innovation Competition: Second Prize Feng Ru Cup: Third Prize in Main Track Production Group Skills Proficient in programming languages including C, Python, and MATLAB Experienced in development with 51 series microcontrollers Competent in utilizing Vivado for FPGA control through Verilog Knowledgeable in deep learning techniques Connect with MeFeel free to connect with me via email: ruixuanzhang@buaa.edu.cn Thanks for visiting my page!

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Hello World经过半个周的努力，我终于完成了我的个人博客的初步搭建。回顾这段时间的经历，我克服了很多困难，学习了许多新知识，最终走到了这一步。 这一刻，看着我的博客，我感觉成就满满，仿佛体会到了“痴儿了却公家事，快阁东西倚晚晴”的心境。这种喜悦与满足难以言表，每一行代码，每一个设置，都倾注了我的心血和努力。 然而，我深知这只是一个开始。我不能止步于此，必须继续前进，向着我的理想和目标不断迈进。未来的路还很长，我会继续学习和成长，不断完善和丰富我的博客，希望它能记录我的成长历程，成为我不断进步的见证。 感谢所有在这过程中帮助过我的人，也感谢自己没有放弃。让我们共同期待未来的精彩吧！ Andy Zhang
